tool.name: OGS: CreateAnchors
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'CreateAnchors'.
tool.command: for i in $input; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; for i in $json_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; CreateAnchors --input '$input.element_identifier' --json-file '$json_file.element_identifier' #if str($tolerance).strip() != 'None' and str($tolerance).strip() != '': --tolerance '$tolerance' #end if #if str($max_iter).strip() != 'None' and str($max_iter).strip() != '': --max-iter '$max_iter' #end if --output output_1.vtu

param.name: json_file
param.label: json file
param.help: Input (.json) JSON file containing anchor start and end points

param.name: max_iter
param.label: max iter
param.help: maximum number of iterations of the internal root-finding algorithm, (min = 0)

tool.help: This tool runs the **CreateAnchors** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
